oauth.description: prints the bot's oauth url into the chat

purge.description: deletes/purges data from the online database

nuke.description: deletes messages based off time to live

guilds.description: lists all guilds w/ member count

reaction.description: allows you to add bot replies

poll.description: allows you to create a yes/no poll

urban.description: allows you to search urban dictionary

setup.description: sets up a welcome message, admin list, and more

config.description: change the owner id, or the welcome message

admin.description: add or remove guild admins to your configuration
